# bits && pixels blog

bitsnpixles.dev (opens new window)
This is a place for reminders and thoughts on whatever I come across as a developer that I find reassuring to have a permalink for.

(i am no longer using the .io domain extention on account of the colonialism issue (opens new window))

# Getting Started

These instructions will get you a copy of the project up and running on your local machine for development and testing purposes. See deployment for notes on how to deploy the project on a live system.

# Prerequisites

You need yarn (opens new window) or npm (opens new window) on your machine, an evergreen browser and preferably your favorite text edtior ðŸ¤“

# Installing

Clone this repo

> git clone https://github.com/petterhoel/blog.git

Change directory

> cd blog

Install dependencies

> yarn

Spin up the dev server

> yarn docs:dev

navigate to localhost:8080 (opens new window)

# Running the tests

thank you for playing! but our tests are in another castle

# Deployment (opens new window)

A merge to master will deploy this site.

If you are using this as a starter for your own project you wanna run

> yarn docs:build

That will create all the static files for your site and place them in docs/.vuepress/dist. Copy these files to your sites root folder.

This projects uses netlify (opens new window) for that. They make it real simple.

# Built With

  • VuePress (opens new window) - VuePress
  • Netlify (opens new window) - Netlify
